ValidationRule.description: Enforce the formatting of hexadecimal numbers
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( LEFT( Label_Color__c, 1 ) <> "#", LEN( Label_Color__c ) < 7, LEFT( Background_Color__c, 1 ) <> "#", LEN( Background_Color__c ) < 7 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Hexadecimal numbers should include a leading "#" and must have a valid length
